content.html: I actually enjoy using Jira compared to a lot of other ticketing systems... but man it is SO EASY to make miserable to use, even internally. Where team A has a workflow entirely unique compared to team B. Epics are hidden on some screens but not all. etc...
content.value: I actually enjoy using Jira compared to a lot of other ticketing systems... but man it is SO EASY to make miserable to use, even internally. Where team A has a workflow entirely unique compared to team B. Epics are hidden on some screens but not all. etc...
